# 获取地址栏参数

function getUrlParams (name) {
  try {
    var url = window.location.search;
    if (url.indexOf('?') == 1) { return false; }
    url = url.substr(1);
    url = url.split('&');
    var name = name || '';
    var nameres;
    // 获取全部参数及其值
    for (var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) {
      var info = url[i].split('=');
      var obj = {};
      obj[info[0]] = decodeURI(info[1]);
      url[i] = obj;
    }
    // 如果传入一个参数名称，就匹配其值
    if (name) {
      for (var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) {
        for (const key in url[i]) {
          if (key == name) {
            nameres = url[i][key];
          }
        }
      }
    } else {
      nameres = url;
    }
    // 返回结果
    return nameres;
  } catch (e) {
    return false
  }
}

使用

Q: 现有路径为‘https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=2’

A: getUrlParams(wd) // 2
